Deprecated Interfaces
org.archive.queue.Deque
          As of 1.10.0. Unused. 
org.archive.queue.Stack
          As of 1.10.0. Unused. 
 

Deprecated Classes
org.archive.util.CachedBdbMap
          use ObjectIdentityBdbCache instead 
org.archive.crawler.filter.ContentTypeRegExpFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. To be replaced by an equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.scope.DomainScope
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingScope. 
org.archive.crawler.frontier.DomainSensitiveFrontier
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by BdbFrontier and QuotaEnforcer. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.FilePatternFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by MatchesFilePatternDecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.HopsFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.scope.HostScope
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingScope. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.OrFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.PathDepthFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.PathologicalPathFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.scope.PathScope
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingScope. 
org.archive.util.PreJ15Utils
          Will be removed post 1.10.0 Heritrix. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.SurtPrefixFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.scope.SurtPrefixScope
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingScope. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.TransclusionFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.URIListRegExpFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule. 
org.archive.crawler.filter.URIRegExpFilter
          As of release 1.10.0. Replaced by DecidingFilter and equivalent DecideRule.

          Use #getConnectionWithTimeout(HostConfiguration, long)

org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CrawlURI.getLinkHopCount()

          Use initialize(Collection, port) instead

          Use HttpConnectionParams.isStaleCheckingEnabled(), HttpConnectionManager.getParams(). 
org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CrawlURI.markAsSeed()
            
org.archive.io.WriterPoolMember.readFullyFrom(InputStream, long, byte[])
          Use WriterPoolMember.copyFrom(InputStream,long,boolean) instead 
org.archive.io.WriterPoolMember.readToLimitFrom(InputStream, long, byte[])
          Use WriterPoolMember.copyFrom(InputStream,long,boolean) instead 
org.archive.httpclient.ThreadLocalHttpConnectionManager.setConnectionStaleCheckingEnabled(boolean)
          Use HttpConnectionParams.setStaleCheckingEnabled(boolean), HttpConnectionManager.getParams(). 
org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CrawlURI.setContentDigest(byte[])
          Use CrawlURI.setContentDigest(String scheme, byte[]) 
org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.startEmbeddedWebserver(int, boolean, String)
          Use startEmbeddedWebserver(hosts, port, adminLoginPassword) 
org.archive.io.Latin1ByteReplayCharSequence.substring(int, int)
          please use subSequence() and then toString() directly 
org.archive.crawler.framework.StatisticsTracking.totalBytesWritten()
          misnomer; use totalBytesCrawled instead 
org.archive.crawler.framework.Frontier.totalBytesWritten()
          misnomer; consult StatisticsTracker instead 
org.archive.crawler.admin.StatisticsTracker.totalBytesWritten()
          use totalBytesCrawled 
org.archive.crawler.frontier.AbstractFrontier.totalBytesWritten()
          misnomer; use StatisticsTracking figures instead 
org.archive.io.arc.ARCWriter.write(String, String, String, long, long, ByteArrayOutputStream)
          use input-stream version directly instead 
org.archive.io.warc.WARCWriter.writeRecord(String, String, String, String, URI, ANVLRecord, InputStream, long)
          Use WARCWriter.writeRecord(String,String,String,String,URI,ANVLRecord,InputStream,long,boolean) instead 
 

Deprecated Constructors

          Use SimpleHttpServer(name,context,hosts,port,expandWebapps)
